item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，苹果公司正在洽谈加入 OpenAI 的新一轮融资
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司正在洽谈投资 OpenAI，作为新一轮融资的一部分，这将使这家 ChatGPT 制造商的估值超过 1000 亿美元。【原文：Apple is in talks to invest in OpenAI as part of a new fundraising round that would value the ChatGPT maker above $100 billion, Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 惠誉确认美国评级为 "AA+"，前景稳定
item.description: 评级机构惠誉周四确认美利坚合众国的信用等级为 "AA+"，称其具有人均收入高和财政灵活等结构性优势。【原文：Ratings agency Fitch affirmed the United States of America's credit rating at "AA+" on Thursday, citing its structural strengths including high per capita income and financial flexibility.】

item.title: 新日铁公司高管表示，同行敦促东京遏制从中国进口钢铁
item.description: 日本新日铁公司副董事长森隆弘（Takahiro Mori）在接受采访时说，新日铁公司和其他日本钢铁制造商正在敦促东京考虑抑制从世界最大的钢铁生产国中国进口廉价钢铁，以保护本地市场。【原文：Nippon Steel and other Japanese steelmakers are urging Tokyo to consider curbing cheap steel imports coming from China, the world's biggest steel producer, to protect the local market, Vice Chairman Takahiro Mori said in an interview.】

item.title: 通用汽车将把 BrightDrop 电动商用车转入旗下雪佛兰品牌
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）周四表示，将把 BrightDrop 商用货车划归雪佛兰旗下，使这种纯电动汽车能够利用该品牌遍布北美的庞大经销商和服务网络。【原文：General Motors said on Thursday it would transition BrightDrop commercial vans under Chevrolet, allowing the all-electric vehicle to utilize the brand's extensive dealership and service network across North America.】

item.title: EIA 称今年劳动节前美国汽油价格走低
item.description: 美国能源信息署（EIA）周四表示，进入周一劳动节联邦假日的周末，美国汽油价格大幅低于去年同期，从而结束了美国的夏季驾车季节。【原文：U.S. gasoline prices were substantially lower than last year heading into the weekend of the Labor Day federal holiday on Monday, which ends the U.S. summer driving season, the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) said on Thursday.】

item.title: Polestar 首席财务官表示，电动汽车关税可能会损害欧洲企业和行业的利益
item.description: 瑞典电动汽车制造商 Polestar 的首席财务官周四表示，欧盟和美国对中国制造的电动汽车征收进口关税将损害欧洲企业的利益。【原文：Import tariffs imposed by the European Union and the United States on China-made electric vehicles will harm European based companies, the chief financial officer of Swedish EV maker Polestar said on Thursday.】

item.title: 洛克希德-雷神合资公司从美国陆军获得价值 13 亿美元的标枪导弹合同
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）和 RTX 雷神公司（Raytheon）的合资企业获得了美国陆军价值 13 亿美元的 "标枪 "导弹后续合同。【原文：A joint venture between Lockheed Martin and RTX's Raytheon was awarded a $1.3 billion follow-on contract by the U.S. army for its Javelin missiles, which has played a major role in Ukraine's defense against Russia's invasion, Lockheed said on Thursday.】

item.title: Affirm 业绩飙升，BNPL 贷款公司力争提前实现盈利目标
item.description: Affirm 的股价周四上涨了 33%，此前这家 "先买后付 "贷款公司的季度业绩超出预期，并表示预计将在下一财年第四季度实现盈利，早于华尔街的预测。【原文：Affirm shares rose 33% on Thursday after the buy-now-pay-later lender trounced estimates for quarterly results and said it expects to be profitable by the fourth quarter of next fiscal year, sooner than Wall Street had forecast.】

item.title: 尽管夏季旅行人数创下新高，但美国航空取消率仍然很低
item.description: 美国运输部周四表示，尽管夏季旅行人数创下历史新高，而且网络安全公司 Crowdstrike 在 7 月份引发了严重的航班中断事件，但美国航空公司今年取消了 1.6% 的航班。【原文：U.S. airlines have canceled 1.6% of all flights this year despite record summer travel and significant disruptions in July sparked by cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike , the Transportation Department said Thursday.】

item.title: 力拓、比亚迪和 LG Energy 有资格参与智利 Altoandinos 锂项目
item.description: 国营矿业公司ENAMI周四表示，矿业巨头力拓和中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪是有资格提出在智利阿尔托安迪诺斯盐滩开发锂项目建议书的六家公司之一。【原文：Mining giant Rio Tinto and Chinese EV-maker BYD are among the six companies eligible to proceed with proposals to develop a lithium project in Chile's Altoandinos salt flats, state-run mining company ENAMI said on Thursday.】

item.title: Gap 第二季度销售额增长
item.description: 服装零售商 Gap 周四公布，受 Old Navy 和同名品牌需求强劲的帮助，其第二季度销售额猛增 5%。【原文：Apparel retailer Gap posted a 5% jump in its second-quarter sales on Thursday, helped by stronger demand at its Old Navy and namesake brands.】

item.title: 马拉松石油公司股东投票支持康菲石油公司 160 亿美元交易
item.description: 马拉松石油公司股东周四批准了康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）以近 160 亿美元收购这家美国石油生产商的交易。【原文：Marathon Oil shareholders on Thursday approved the U.S. oil producer's nearly $16 billion acquisition by ConocoPhillips , the company said.】

item.title: 美国 7 月未决房屋销售跌至历史最低点
item.description: 由于较高的房价和借贷成本将潜在买家挤出市场，7 月份美国旧房购买合同降至历史最低点。【原文：Contracts to buy U.S. previously owned homes dropped to a record low in July as higher prices and borrowing costs drove potential buyers from the market.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，三星对诺基亚移动网络资产表现出兴趣
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，电信设备制造商诺基亚一直在探索其移动网络业务的各种选择，并引起了包括三星电子在内的收购者的兴趣。【原文：Telecom equipment maker Nokia has been exploring options for its mobile networks business and has drawn interest from suitors including Samsung Electronics , Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Meta 称其 Llama 人工智能模型正被银行和科技公司使用
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta 在周四的一份声明中说，Meta 的 Llama 人工智能模型正被高盛和 AT&T 等公司用于客户服务、文件审查和计算机代码生成等业务功能。【原文：Meta's Llama artificial intelligence models are being used by companies including Goldman Sachs and AT&T for business functions like customer service, document review and computer code generation, the social media giant said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 杰克丹尼尔酒生产商布朗-福尔曼因需求不振未达季度目标
item.description: 布朗-福尔曼公司（Brown-Forman）周四公布的第一季度利润和销售额均未达到预期，原因是投入成本上升以及对价格昂贵的威士忌和烈酒的需求疲软。【原文：Brown-Forman missed first-quarter profit and sales estimates on Thursday, hurt by higher input costs and weaker demand for its pricey whiskey and spirits.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经济增长因消费者支出而上调
item.description: 由于消费者支出强劲，美国第二季度经济增长速度超过了最初的预期，同时企业利润反弹，这应有助于维持经济扩张。【原文：The U.S. economy grew faster than initially thought in the second quarter amid strong consumer spending, while corporate profits rebounded, which should help to sustain the expansion.】

item.title: 亚马逊工人将参加美国团队工人罢工
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）工会周四表示，亚马逊公司的工人正在组织起来，加入团队工人联合会（Teamsters）在美国多个州举行的罢工，抗议不公平的劳工行为。【原文：Amazon.com workers are organizing to join Teamsters' strikes in several U.S. states over unfair labor practices, the labor union said on Thursday.】

item.title: 报告显示，8月份美国汽车销量将因劳动节周末激增而上升
item.description: 据行业咨询公司J.D. Power和GlobalData周四联合发布的报告显示，8月份美国新车销量预计将同比增长4%以上，部分原因是报告期内正值劳动节周末。【原文：New vehicle sales in the United States are projected to rise over 4% in August from a year ago, partly boosted by the Labor Day weekend falling within the reporting period, according to a joint report by industry consultants J.D. Power and GlobalData on Thursday.】

item.title: OpenAI、Anthropic 与美国政府签署人工智能研究与测试协议
item.description: 美国人工智能安全研究所（U.S. Artificial Intelligence Safety Institute）周四表示，人工智能初创公司OpenAI和Anthropic已与美国政府签署协议，对其人工智能模型进行研究、测试和评估。【原文：AI startups OpenAI and Anthropic have signed deals with the United States government for research, testing and evaluation of their artificial intelligence models, the U.S. Artificial Intelligence Safety Institute said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数略有下降
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量有所下降，但下岗工人的再就业机会却越来越少，这表明 8 月份的失业率很可能仍然居高不下。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits slipped last week, but re-employment opportunities for laid-off workers are becoming more scarce, a sign that the unemployment rate probably remained elevated in August.】

item.title: 康泰伦特在与诺和诺德母公司完成交易前收入超出预期
item.description: 合同药品生产商康泰伦特周四公布的第四季度收入超过了分析师的预期，这主要得益于其开发和生产细胞与基因疗法的生物制剂部门。【原文：Contract drug manufacturer Catalent beat analysts' estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, helped by its biologics segment that develops and manufactures cell and gene therapies.】

item.title: 优步投资英国初创公司 Wayve，加速推进自动驾驶项目
item.description: 优步（Uber）和英国自动驾驶技术初创公司周四表示，优步将投资 Wayve，帮助这家英国自动驾驶技术初创公司与主要汽车制造商合作，加快系统开发。【原文：Ride-hailing platform Uber will invest in Wayve to help the British self-driving technology startup work with major automakers to speed up the development of its systems, the two companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英镑的惊人涨势令紧张的汇市惶惶不安
item.description: 分析师警告说，英镑兑美元汇率已创下约两年半的新高，英镑兑欧元汇率也在飞速上升，这些走势都受到了投机性利率押注的支撑，而在仍受八月初动荡影响的市场中，这些押注可能会迅速瓦解。【原文：Sterling has hit roughly 2-1/2 years highs against the dollar and is flying high versus the euro, in moves analysts warn are underpinned by speculative interest rate bets that could unravel fast in markets still shaken by early August turmoil.】

item.title: 金宝汤因需求稳定，预计全年销售额高于预期
item.description: 金宝汤公司（Campbell Soup Co）周四预计全年销售额将高于华尔街预期，该公司将赌注押在几个季度的提价以及汤和即食食品的稳定需求所带来的好处上。【原文：Campbell Soup Co forecast annual sales above Wall Street expectations on Thursday, betting on benefits from several quarters worth of price hikes as well as steady demand for its soups and ready-to-eat meals.】

item.title: 软件公司押注人工智能工具助力增长，Salesforce业绩大增
item.description: 由于投资者对这家客户关系管理软件制造商乐观的季度业绩及其推动增长的人工智能技术表示欢迎，Salesforce 的股价周四上涨超过 5%。【原文：Shares of Salesforce gained more than 5% on Thursday as investors cheered the customer relationship management software maker's upbeat quarterly results and its artificial intelligence push to drive growth.】

item.title: 百思买上调年度利润预期，因为更严格的成本控制已见成效
item.description: 百思买（Best Buy）周四上调了年度利润预期，原因是对成本的更严格控制帮助这家电子产品零售商抵消了各品类大幅折扣和促销带来的影响。【原文：Best Buy raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday as tighter controls on costs help the electronics retailer offset the impact from steeper discounts and promotions across its categories.】

item.title: Polestar 受需求放缓和推迟推出汽车的影响，再次出现亏损
item.description: 周四，瑞典电动汽车（EV）制造商Polestar公布了第二季度运营亏损，就在此前一天，该公司因资金问题和销售下滑而更换了首席执行官。【原文：Polestar posted a second quarter operating loss on Thursday, a day after the Swedish electric vehicle (EV) maker replaced its CEO amid funding issues and flagging sales.】

item.title: 美元通用公司下调年度销售预期，原因是自由支配需求疲软
item.description: 折扣零售商 Dollar General 周四下调了年度同店销售预期，原因是注重成本的顾客减少了利润较高商品的消费，转而优先购买必需品。【原文：Discount retailer Dollar General cut annual same-store sales forecast on Thursday, as cost-conscious customers cut back spending on its higher-margin goods to prioritize essential purchases.】

item.title: 早间竞价英伟达 "超预期"，但影响有限
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】
